name: Google Custom Background 0.0.1 BETA
description:
Google Custom Background 

This is a BETA version and maybe unstable

IMPORTANT NOTE: You've to enable Google Dark Mode for better experience
To enable dark mode, go to google.com > Settings > Dark Theme

New backgrounds will be added soon
